snippet: If the Supreme Court overturns the Defense of Marriage Act, its implications may hinge on how vigorously President Obama seeks to change legal language.
abstract: Implications of pending Supreme Court ruling that could overturn Defense of Marriage Act may hinge on how vigorously Pres Obama seeks to change legal language; decisions could affect federal benefits for same-sex couples.
lead_paragraph: If the Supreme Court overturns the Defense of Marriage Act, its implications may hinge on how vigorously President Obama seeks to change legal language.

headline.main: Obama’s Pen May Shape Scope of Marriage Ruling
headline.print_headline: Obama’s Pen May Shape Scope of Marriage Ruling

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
